TopicTitle: Where is the Craters Biome on Duna??

Articles.Content:
Got a contract for Dunas Craters and i canÃ‚Â´t for my life find it.

Used Scansat, Mechjeb and even Google but no luck.

All i find is Highlands, Midlands, Lowlands and Poles.

Just want to get this bloody probe landed and get on with it.

Any help is much appreciated.
If it's a survey mission the place name might not refer to a biome but there should be a marker on the map to show where you need to be to complete the contract.
Near the poles. The biome is small and very difficult to find without using the biome visibility cheat. If you do want to use the cheat, the biome is coloured purple.
I couldn't find it before but with the tip above I did find an area...
Boy, that was hard to land at - its quite a small area.

I'll just say it. The biomes on Duna are boring and kinda suck.

Duna needs some love devs!

I'll just say it. The biomes on Duna are boring and kinda suck.

Duna needs some love devs!

Before Beta Duna had zero biomes now it has them, I would call that love. I would not doubt that they will do other round of polish to them soonÃ¢â€žÂ¢ though.

I'm saying Duna needs a Olympus Mons, or something similar(or something just more interesting!). Ike has more interesting biomes...

Ike, like ruffles, has ridges.

There are some pretty good biomenames. me myself has discovered the explodium oceans, which are just all the oceans and lakes on eve, and i have heard about a "Sagan Sea" on Laythe. I really want to know all the biomes though...
All the planets need some lovin in terms of landscape quality. Beyond atmospherics, it's one of my most eagerly awaited updates.
